General.Name: Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited provides real estate and warehouse rental services in Bangkok. The company operates through Property for Rent and Service, and Peer-To-Peer Lending Platform segments. It also engages in fintech and investment business, as well as peer-to-peer lending business through online platform. The company was formerly known as P Plus P Public Company Limited and changed its name to Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2012. Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
